text: â€œAmene akukana Allah, pambuyo pomukhulupirira, (chilango chachikulu chikumuyembekezera), kupatula yemwe adakakamizidwa, uku mtima wake utakhazikika pa chikhulupiliro; koma amene akutsekulira mtima wake kusakhulupirira, mkwiyo wa Allah uli pa iwo (ndipo anthu otere) adzapata chilango chachikulu
